name: Pix Me Up (Android)
description:
Pix Me Up is a game combining strategic thinking with memory skills. For children and parents, the principle is simple: you have PIXs, small squares of color, that you need to assemble to make the requested pattern.

Check your progress on a map, share your scores online, on social networks ... All this is possible! 

Pix Me Up, become a PIXel artist on Android devices!
